subject: Big Brown (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
Preakness Stakes
lead_paragraph: Big Brown’s trainer, Rick Dutrow, and the hoof specialist Ian McKinlay say they do not think the colt will miss the Belmont Stakes on June 7.
snippet: Big Brown’s trainer, Rick Dutrow, and the hoof specialist Ian McKinlay say they do not think the colt will miss the Belmont Stakes on June 7.
